mapper.select: select id, assignment_id, title, description, full_score, space_limit, time_limit, number_submit, number_solve, index_in_assignment, solution from "problem" order by id offset #{offset} limit #{limit}
select id, assignment_id, title, description, full_score, space_limit, time_limit, number_submit, number_solve, index_in_assignment, solution from "problem" where valid and id = #{id};

select id, assignment_id, title, description, full_score, space_limit, time_limit, number_submit, number_solve, index_in_assignment, solution from "problem" where assignment_id = #{id} order by index_in_assignment;

select id, assignment_id, title, description, full_score, space_limit, time_limit, number_submit, number_solve, index_in_assignment, solution from "problem" where id in ( select distinct problem_id from "problem_tag" where valid and tag_id = #{id})
